product_summary: AI Booster is a tool that provides a list of over 150 AI directories, 40+ Twitter accounts to follow, 35+ AI marketing tools, 35+ newsletters, 20+ YouTube channels, 20+ podcasts, 15+ Discord AI communities, 10+ AI dedicated communities, and 5 "must know" ChatGPT prompts. It also includes a ready-to-use influencer brief. The data is updated on a monthly basis.
product_pros: Provides a comprehensive list of AI resources
Can help drive traffic to your AI website or product
Can help you stay ahead of the curve in the rapidly-evolving world of AI
Can help you get your product to market faster and with less effort and costs
Comes with a ready-to-use influencer brief
product_cons: Can be time-consuming to submit your website or product to all of the directories
May not be effective for all AI startups
May require additional marketing efforts to get your product noticed

product_usecases.case: Finding AI directories to submit your website or product to
product_usecases.details: AI Booster provides a list of over 150 AI directories that you can submit your website or product to. This can help you drive traffic to your site and improve your search engine ranking.
AI Booster provides a list of over 40 AI influencers to follow on Twitter. This can help you stay up-to-date on the latest AI trends and news.
AI Booster provides a list of over 35 AI marketing tools that you can use to market your AI product or service.
AI Booster provides a list of over 35 AI newsletters that you can subscribe to. This can help you stay up-to-date on the latest AI news and trends.
AI Booster provides a list of over 20 AI YouTube channels that you can watch. This can help you learn more about AI and how to use it in your business.

product_toolfor.details: AI Booster is a valuable tool for AI startups that are looking to grow their organic traffic and get their product to market faster.
AI Booster is a valuable tool for AI marketers who are looking to stay ahead of the curve and find new ways to market their products and services.
AI Booster is a valuable tool for AI enthusiasts who are looking to learn more about AI and how to use it in their personal and professional lives.

product_toolfor.target: Anyone who is interested in AI
product_toolfor.details: AI Booster is a valuable tool for anyone who is interested in AI and wants to learn more about it.

product_toolfor.target: Businesses that want to use AI
product_toolfor.details: AI Booster can help businesses that want to use AI find the resources they need to get started.

product_pricing: Not mentioned in the provided text
